title: brigadi
author: brigadi
content: 💥Microsoft Office Account for Sale, Cheap Office 365 AccountsOffice 365 Professional Plus Account 5 Users Windows/Mac/iOS/Android✅Instructions after purchase:➊Go to https://office.com/➋.Be sure to log out of your account➌.Press the LOGIN button➍.Enter the username and password for the purchased account➎.The system asks you to change your password upon first login.➏.We change the password and write down our new password and do not lose it, we also save the received mail address in a safe place➐To be able to recover your password if you lose it, add your phone number and Microsoft Authenticator to this section https://mysignins.microsoft.com/security-info➑IMPORTANT before installing, remove your old offices from your PC.➒.We go into the account there, click the install office button, download and install Office➊⓿.Once installed, log in to your new account in the app➊➊.And everything will be activated.📌 Number of Devices: 5📌 Interface language: All languages📌 System bit depth: x32/x64
